strings.Value: {n}The governor greets you with an oily smile.{/n} "Your Highness! Welcome to your loyal {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}!"
"Thank you for honoring us with your presence! It is always a great honor for us to see you here!"

"Things are very well! Peace, law, and order took roost in the city after you so bravely overcame the usurper. Its citizens, tormented under the heel of the tyrant, are glad to see you as their {mf|King|Queen}, and tirelessly praise your wisdom and kindness!"

"All is well. There are some problems with crime — it's not very easy to keep the city in order without guards. But please don't worry, I'm working on putting a new guard in place — more competent than the old one, and more loyal to you personally!"
